Container.Name: TAK-Server-Automated-Setup
Container.Overview:
TAK Server 5.4 One-Click Automated Setup for Unraid
**SIMPLE AUTOMATED SETUP:** 1. Download TAK Server 5.4 ZIP from https://tak.gov/products/tak-server 2. Place the ZIP file in the mapped setup directory 3. Start this container - completely automated setup begins 4. Monitor container logs for progress and generated credentials 5. Access TAK Server at https://YOUR-IP:8445 after setup completes 6. Import the generated admin.p12 certificate to your browser
**FEATURES:** ✓ Bulletproof automated setup with comprehensive error handling ✓ Automatic JKS certificate generation (required for TAK 5.4) ✓ Network binding fixes for Docker compatibility ✓ Custom port mappings to avoid conflicts ✓ Complete validation and secure credential generation ✓ Auto-detection of docker structure (flat/amd64) ✓ No manual configuration required
**AFTER SETUP:** This is a one-time setup container. After completion, TAK Server runs independently via docker-compose in the setup directory. You can then stop this setup container.
**REQUIREMENTS:** - TAK Server 5.4 ZIP file from tak.gov - At least 4GB available disk space - Ports 8445, 8092, 5432 available
Container.PostArgs: sh -c " echo 'TAK Server 5.4 Automated Setup Starting...' && apk add --no-cache bash git unzip zip openssl curl docker-compose docker-cli openjdk17-jre-headless && echo 'Downloading setup scripts...' && git clone https://github.com/Zeroradiance/tak-server-unraid.git /tmp/taksetup && cp -r /tmp/taksetup/* /setup/ && cd /setup && echo 'Starting automated TAK Server setup...' && chmod +x scripts/setup-unraid-complete.sh && bash scripts/setup-unraid-complete.sh "
Container.DonateText: Support TAK Server for Unraid development
Container.Description: One-click automated setup for TAK Server 5.4 with bulletproof error handling and complete automation.
